overview: A hardened CIA operative finds himself at the mercy of a precocious 9-year-old girl, having been sent undercover to surveil her family.
title: My Spy

overview: When a young boy accidentally triggers the universe's most lethal hunters' return to Earth, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and a disgruntled science teacher can prevent the end of the human race.
title: The Predator

overview: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
title: Iron Man

overview: Dom Cobb, a skilled thief who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets, is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a task considered to be impossible.
title: Inception

overview: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.
title: Million Dollar Baby

overview: When a young boy discovers a magical sword in the stone, he must unite his friends and enemies into a band of knights and, together with the legendary wizard Merlin, take on the wicked enchantress Morgana.
title: The Kid Who Would Be King

overview: An ambitious journalist, a poet, and a writer come across an actress as they look for inspirations to overcome their writer's block.
title: The Dead Don't Die

overview: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.
title: Spider-Man: Homecoming

overview: When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world and into ours.
title: The Smurfs

overview: Sheriff Roy Pulsipher is about to enjoy an eternity of kicking undead ass and taking names. But he has his afterlife's work cut out for him when a new recruit shows up.
title: R.I.P.D.
